hey guys still stuck on 800x600 any idea: xgl will look much better at that rez

look at your /etc/X11/xorg.conf near the bottom, you will see multiple lines that have a list of common resolution types, take out all of the ones higher than your preferred res on all lines to get GDM to use your preferred res (as well as your desktop which can be set in Preferences)
and you can use automatix to install nvidia drivers easily
xgl and compiz will interfere with nvidia 3d glx
